pages.text: Dulverton is a royal battleship with three large caliber guns and a large cannon. Whenever the royal family needs to travel by sea, they'll travel in this ship together with over 100 servants.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/mortar)$(l)Large Cannon/$$(br)Dulverton targets a $(l)4 by 4 tile area/$ and fire's its large cannon, damaging $(l)7 random tiles/$. This ability has $(l)2 Uses/$ and costs $(l)13 Energy/$ to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/counterfire)$(l)Counterfire/$$(br)$(l)When Dulverton is hit/$, it fires its front cannons, damaging $(l)3 random opponent tiles/$.
pages.title: Passive Ability
